statements: UPDATE abandonded_carts SET follow_up_emails_sent = 2 WHERE cart_id = 101;
UPDATE abandonded_carts SET customer_id = 201, products = '["productA", "productB"]' WHERE cart_id = 102;
UPDATE abandoned_carts SET follow_up_emails_sent = 2, abandoned_date = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE cart_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201;
UPDATE abandoned_carts SET products = '[{"name": "Shirt", "quantity": 3}, {"name": "Pants", "quantity": 2}]' WHERE customer_id = 202 AND cart_id = 102;
UPDATE abandoned_carts SET customer_id = 12345, cart_items = '{"item": "product1", "quantity": 3}', abandoned_time = '2023-07-15 10:30:00' WHERE cart_id = 1001;
UPDATE follow_up_emails SET email_content = 'Your cart is waiting for you. Complete your purchase now!', email_sent_time = '2023-07-15 11:00:00', customer_id = 54321 WHERE email_id = 2001;
UPDATE abandoned_carts SET customer_id = 101, cart_items = '["item1","item2","item3"]' WHERE cart_id = 123;
UPDATE follow_up_emails SET email_content = 'Hello, this is a follow-up email.' WHERE email_id = 456;
UPDATE abandoned_carts SET abandoned_at = '2022-08-15 10:00:00' WHERE cart_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', full_name = 'John Smith' WHERE user_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE users SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
UPDATE abandoned_carts SET total_amount = 150.75, cart_items = '{"item1": "Product A", "item2": "Product B"}' WHERE cart_id = 12345;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE abandoned_carts SET total_amount = 100.50, cart_items = '{"item1": "Product A", "item2": "Product B"}' WHERE cart_id = 101;
UPDATE targeted_emails SET email_status = 'Delivered', opened = true WHERE email_id = 201;
UPDATE abandoned_carts SET email_sent = TRUE WHERE cart_id = 12345;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE abandoned_carts SET email_sent = TRUE, abandoned_at = '2022-02-15' WHERE cart_id = 12345
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 67890
